item.title: Wednesday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: Soft economic reports and tariff worries dragged the S&P 500 to a losing session on Tuesday. Here's what's on CNBC's radar heading into Wednesday.

item.title: Utilities are surging in 2025. Wall Street likes these dividend-paying stocks
item.description: The once-boring utilities sector is emerging as a winner in the market this year. A few names are beloved by analysts and also offer solid dividends.

item.title: Coinbase shares slide Tuesday as crypto play takes double-digit fall from July record
item.description: Shares of the cryptocurrency trading platform have collapsed since notching a record on July 18.

item.title: Disney earnings are coming Wednesday. Here’s what top analysts expect
item.description: Wall Street expects Disney's earnings and revenue in the latest quarter to once again beat analysts' expectations.

item.title: A technical look at Wall Street's 'fear gauge' and how to hedge against potential volatility
item.description: There are plenty of overhanging uncertainties that could derail this rally, says chart analyst Todd Gordon.
